title: en manathamarai
sahitya:
en manattAmarai mEl e tAyE un malar tALinai vaittaruLvAyE

anupallavi

tunbam tuDaittE tUya nilaiyilE inbamAna un ishaigaL pADavE

caraNam

tanmayamAkkum tava vazhi ariyEn dharmamum tyAgamum shiridum teriyEn
Cinmaya rUpiNi shivai manOnmaNi varmamillAmalE vandudava nIyE
